::Grimlock::
=A0
Grimlock turns to Lord Perseus.
=A0
Grimlock: Elder beat M=
inions at Ark!
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok::
=A0
The two G2s had returned =
to the surface, one from air and one from underground, and transformed to r=
obot modes. They were about to head for the Black Fortress with Hydras when=
 Jhiaxus realized what was about to happen.
=A0
Jhiaxus: He is going to mak=
e a full attack on the Ark! Hydras, I hate to say this but we have to stop =
that. it would effect us all!
=A0
::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
=A0
While still c=
hasing the Minons from the Ark with Legacy, the recent news has caused Elde=
r to want an update. He opens a channel from the Maximal shuttle to any Max=
imals at the Black Fortress.
=A0
Elder: Lord Elder to Maximal rescue party.=
 Do you ready, over?
=A0
Grimlock: Me, Grimlock, here.
=A0
Elder: Grimlock,=
 whats happening?
=A0
Grimlock: You beat Minions at Ark!
=A0
Elder: Yes but=
 we had help. We're chasing two that are heading towards Atlantis. What's h=
appening at the Predacon base?
=A0
Grimlock: We gettin' slaged!
=A0
Elder: =
I need more then that, Grimlock!
=A0
Grimlock: Rod-Dee-Mus turn Decepticon.=
 Predacons have Nightlight and Windlord too! Cyclonus and Minions show up. =
Beat us up, bad! Cyclonus now seem bored. Might leave...
=A0
Elder: He'll c=
ome for the Ark! Grimlock, if they leave, you get everyone to the Ark. You =
understand?
=A0
Grimlock: How me, Grimlock, do that?
=A0
Elder: JUST DO IT!=
!
=A0
Elder slams a fist onto the controls, cutting the link. He opens a ne=
w one to Legacy.
=A0
Elder: I've learned that Rodimus has indeed been repro=
grammed. The Predacons still have his wife and another Maximal captive. The=
 Minions showed and beat both sides down. I think he is about to bring his =
whole force towards the Ark. This might be a deversion. We'll have to go ba=
ck.
=A0
::Kup::
=A0
Kup was still watching the data screens. The Matrix Que=
st crew was heading after Minions towards Atlantis. The mass of signatures =
at Hydras' base was still hard to make out but he could tell things were mo=
re calm.

--- On Fri, 6/27/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrot=
e:

From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>
Subject: Re: All Out War
=
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, June 27, 2008, 2:30 PM







As t=
he beleaguered defenders attempt to hatch a plan of escape for 
themselves,=
 and as the sweeps press their advantages from above a 
change appears to c=
ome over the battle. The sweeps move swiftly into 
the air, rising above th=
e level of the immediate battle lines, almost 
as if calling for a cease fi=
re, or at least a temporary cessation of 
combat. ((OOC: although they will=
 keep firing if fired upon)) 

All too quickly the reason for the cease fir=
e becomes all too 
apparent as the large form of Cyclonus in his dreaded sp=
aceship mode 
seems to almost materialize out of the clouds, flanked by two=
 of his 
new minions: Tumult and Decibel. 

Cyclonus looks like he has fare=
d well with the power of the matrix 
and has been transformed by it! Lookin=
g larger, well armed and 
armored, any sensor directed at him might pick up=
 another startling 
change. He is powered not by the nuclear power of the e=
ngines of a 
previous incarnation, or even the fusion power of his last mee=
ting, 
but the full power of something akin to antimatter, and his weapons =

match! 

"You have fallen far too easily Cybertronians! " Cyclonus' voice =

thunders out over the battle field, "I must admit I had not expected 
it. =
Perhaps you were not worthy of my full attentions."

Even as Cyclonus talke=
d the sweeps took up formation around him as he 
began to rise higher into =
the air ((OOC: assuming no one is attacking 
them)). "It would seem that yo=
ur brethren at the Ark were more 
successful than you at thwarting my plans=
, I will be forced to take 
matters in hand."

It is obvious that Cyclonus =
is about to leave . . . 

(Tag or TBC)

Preston
(Da'minion)

 












=

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock turns to Lord Perseus.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: Elder beat Minions at Ark!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The two G2s had returned to the surface, one from air and one from underground, and transformed to robot modes. They were about to head for the Black Fortress with Hydras when Jhiaxus realized what was about to happen.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus: He is going to make a full attack on the Ark! Hydras, I hate to say this but we have to stop that. it would effect us all!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Elder/Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>While still chasing the Minons from the Ark with Legacy, the recent news has caused Elder to want an update. He opens a channel from the Maximal shuttle to any Maximals at the Black Fortress.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Lord Elder to Maximal rescue party. Do you ready, over?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: Me, Grimlock, here.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Grimlock, whats happening?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: You beat Minions at Ark!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Yes but we had help. We're chasing two that are heading towards Atlantis. What's happening at the Predacon base?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: We gettin' slaged!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: I need more then that, Grimlock!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: Rod-Dee-Mus turn Decepticon. Predacons have Nightlight and Windlord too! Cyclonus and Minions show up. Beat us up, bad! Cyclonus now seem bored. Might leave...</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: He'll come for the Ark! Grimlock, if they leave, you get everyone to the Ark. You understand?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock: How me, Grimlock, do that?</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: JUST DO IT!!</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder slams a fist onto the controls, cutting the link. He opens a new one to Legacy.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: I've learned that Rodimus has indeed been reprogrammed. The Predacons still have his wife and another Maximal captive. The Minions showed and beat both sides down. I think he is about to bring his whole force towards the Ark. This might be a deversion. We'll have to go back.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Kup::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Kup was still watching the data screens. The Matrix Quest crew was heading after Minions towards Atlantis. The mass of signatures at Hydras' base was still hard to make out but he could tell things were more calm.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Fri, 6/27/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: All Out War<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Friday, June 27, 2008, 2:30 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv1676654425>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<P><BR>As the beleaguered defenders attempt to hatch a plan of escape for <BR>themselves, and as the sweeps press their advantages from above a <BR>change appears to come over the battle. The sweeps move swiftly into <BR>the air, rising above the level of the immediate battle lines, almost <BR>as if calling for a cease fire, or at least a temporary cessation of <BR>combat. ((OOC: although they will keep firing if fired upon)) <BR><BR>All too quickly the reason for the cease fire becomes all too <BR>apparent as the large form of Cyclonus in his dreaded spaceship mode <BR>seems to almost materialize out of the clouds, flanked by two of his <BR>new minions: Tumult and Decibel. <BR><BR>Cyclonus looks like he has fared well with the power of the matrix <BR>and has been transformed by it! Looking larger, well armed and <BR>armored, any sensor directed at him might pick up another startling <BR>change. He is powered not by the nuclear power of the engines of a
 <BR>previous incarnation, or even the fusion power of his last meeting, <BR>but the full power of something akin to antimatter, and his weapons <BR>match! <BR><BR>"You have fallen far too easily Cybertronians! " Cyclonus' voice <BR>thunders out over the battle field, "I must admit I had not expected <BR>it. Perhaps you were not worthy of my full attentions."<BR><BR>Even as Cyclonus talked the sweeps took up formation around him as he <BR>began to rise higher into the air ((OOC: assuming no one is attacking <BR>them)). "It would seem that your brethren at the Ark were more <BR>successful than you at thwarting my plans, I will be forced to take <BR>matters in hand."<BR><BR>It is obvious that Cyclonus is about to leave . . . <BR><BR>(Tag or TBC)<BR><BR>Preston<BR>(Da'minion)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
